 Base namespace for common definitions and prototypes.
 
 gft::Image32
 Common definitions and functions to manipulate a grayscale image of 32 bits per pixel.
 
 gft::CImage
 Common definitions and functions to manipulate a color image, providing three samples (color channels) for each pixel.
